ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] WANT EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a sucky dial up. Due to crap phone lines, I connect at 26400 consistently. Doesn t matter what modem I use. The game plays okay on my pIII 450 with 512
ygData.messageBody:
I have a sucky dial up. Due to crap phone lines, I connect at 26400
consistently. Doesn't matter what modem I use. The game plays okay on
my pIII 450 with 512 ram and a 64m vid card. It has some hiccups once
in a while and I have to turn everything off in the bazaar to be able
to have some control there. It's still laggy in the bazaar but I have
no probs.

My second box is a p4 2.2g 512ram 128m vid card. It's also on the
same dial up (yes, only one at a time :( ) but I have NO lag with it.
I entered the bazaar and forgot to turn everything off (100 percent
clip plane emotes, animations etc) and I had less lag than I do with
the other box with all the options turned off.

Dial up zones slower than dsl/cable but I have no issues with the
gameplay.

Timmye Cousteau

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., Meleficent Ouverts
<meleficent22@y...> wrote:
>
> Dial-up? Fast? ROTF LOL
> My dial-up sucks, i have a timed account, which you may or maynot
have.
> It works on dialup, but my boyfriend got cable modem to play
recently and he LOVES it even more now, I am still stuck with dialup
and see the different in speed and most defidently graphics.
> BADBRAD112 <badbrad112@y...> wrote:Hi everyone, i just wanted to
ask some questions. Does this game work well at all using dail up,
cause thats all i got right now and i was wonering if i am gonna need
to upgrade to cable internet to play this game, if any of you out
there use dail up, does it run fast or what?
>
> thanks
